svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - November 9 2024

title: "Week in Ethereum News
November 9, 2024" date: "2024-11-08"
Eth News and Links
EF 2024 report & conflict of interest policy and Mekong testnet (Pectra public testnet) live
Eth R&D protocol call (All Core Devs)
• Execution layer focused protocol call (ACDE #200): Pectra upgrade: Pectra-devnet-4 : testing planned
during Devcon & will then be deprecated Pectra-devnet-5 spec : EIP7702: EXTCODE* delegation behavior
removed Proposal to return fee from getter for EIP7002 & EIP7251 system contracts, review async,
audits started Fusaka upgrade : Activate EOF/PeerDAS separately for testing : agreed to enable as
separate consensus layer & execution layer upgrades EIP7801 eth/70 - sharded blocks protocol: proposal
for short term alternative to integrating Portal Network to serve historical data EIP7610 revert
creation for non-empty storage : EIP was previously retroactively included but some client teams have
issues implementing, alternative to be proposed
• Pectra upgrade: Pectra-devnet-4 : testing planned during Devcon & will then be deprecated
Pectra-devnet-5 spec : EIP7702: EXTCODE* delegation behavior removed Proposal to return fee from
getter for EIP7002 & EIP7251 system contracts, review async, audits started
Pectra upgrade:
• Pectra-devnet-4 : testing planned during Devcon & will then be deprecated
Pectra-devnet-4 : testing planned during Devcon & will then be deprecated
• Pectra-devnet-5 spec : EIP7702: EXTCODE* delegation behavior removed Proposal to return fee from
Pectra-devnet-5 spec :
• EIP7702: EXTCODE* delegation behavior removed
EIP7702: EXTCODE* delegation behavior removed
• Proposal to return fee from getter for EIP7002 & EIP7251 system contracts, review async, audits
started
Proposal to return fee from getter for EIP7002 & EIP7251 system contracts, review async, audits
• Fusaka upgrade : Activate EOF/PeerDAS separately for testing : agreed to enable as separate
consensus layer & execution layer upgrades
Fusaka upgrade :
• Activate EOF/PeerDAS separately for testing : agreed to enable as separate consensus layer &
execution layer upgrades
• EIP7801 eth/70 - sharded blocks protocol: proposal for short term alternative to integrating Portal
Network to serve historical data
EIP7801 eth/70 - sharded blocks protocol: proposal for short term alternative to integrating Portal
• EIP7610 revert creation for non-empty storage : EIP was previously retroactively included but some
client teams have issues implementing, alternative to be proposed
EIP7610 revert creation for non-empty storage : EIP was previously retroactively included but some
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade
• Mekong testnet : Pectra public testnet with devnet-4 spec
Mekong testnet : Pectra public testnet with devnet-4 spec
• Weekly testing call #12 : peerdas-devnet-4 & EOF devnet to be based on pectra-devnet-5 spec, ideally
by the end of November
Weekly testing call #12 : peerdas-devnet-4 & EOF devnet to be based on pectra-devnet-5 spec, ideally
Fusaka (Osaka + Fulu) upgrade
• EVM Object Format (EOF) benefits for ZK proofs : benchmarks show 2.9x more efficient for total &
interpreter cycles, runs 2.7x faster and proof size 2x smaller
Amsterdam upgrade
• Stateless implementers call #27
Layer 1
• Flashbots: rbuilder running in-process with Reth Parallel block building : backtesting shows better
blocks 50% of the time in high MEV
• rbuilder running in-process with Reth
rbuilder running in-process with Reth
• Parallel block building : backtesting shows better blocks 50% of the time in high MEV
Parallel block building : backtesting shows better blocks 50% of the time in high MEV
Research
• 3-slot finality (3SF): finalize blocks within 3 slots using only one voting phase per slot, compared
with single slot finality which uses three voting phases per slot
3-slot finality (3SF): finalize blocks within 3 slots using only one voting phase per slot, compared
• Orbit single-slot finality design : proposal simplifies committee formation
Orbit single-slot finality design : proposal simplifies committee formation
• Random execution auctions (randEAs): mitigate multi-block MEV by auctioning proposing rights for a
slot window but exact slot only assigned & revealed one slot in advance
Random execution auctions (randEAs): mitigate multi-block MEV by auctioning proposing rights for a
• Full DAS analysis : fast sampling can be performed at scale, network can absorb large correlated
failures but malicious majority attacks remain a challenge
Full DAS analysis : fast sampling can be performed at scale, network can absorb large correlated
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
• 🚨 Lido at 27.8% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
🚨 Lido at 27.8% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
• Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority Consensus layer:
Prysm 37% & Lighthouse 33.3% Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
• Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority
Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority
• Consensus layer: Prysm 37% & Lighthouse 33.3%
Consensus layer: Prysm 37% & Lighthouse 33.3%
• Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
• Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Client Releases
• Execution layer: Erigon v2.60.10 : bug fixes Reth v1.1.1 : performance improvements & bug fixes and
Engine 2.0 enabled by default for op-reth
• Erigon v2.60.10 : bug fixes
Erigon v2.60.10 : bug fixes
• Reth v1.1.1 : performance improvements & bug fixes and Engine 2.0 enabled by default for op-reth
Reth v1.1.1 : performance improvements & bug fixes and Engine 2.0 enabled by default for op-reth
For stakers
• Beaconcha.in v2 beta (explorer): real-time monitoring, custom validator groups and adds validator
efficiency metric
Beaconcha.in v2 beta (explorer): real-time monitoring, custom validator groups and adds validator
• BuidlGuidl client : one line command to run Reth + Lighthouse
BuidlGuidl client : one line command to run Reth + Lighthouse
Layer 2
• Marius Van Der Wijden: EVM-semi compatible rollup design , higher throughput but higher trust
assumptions
EIPs/Standards
• EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals): EIP7807 : SSZ execution blocks Meta EIP7808 : Reserve tx-type
range for RIPs EIP7809 : Native tokens
EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals):
• EIP7807 : SSZ execution blocks
EIP7807 : SSZ execution blocks
• Meta EIP7808 : Reserve tx-type range for RIPs
Meta EIP7808 : Reserve tx-type range for RIPs
• EIP7809 : Native tokens
EIP7809 : Native tokens
• RIPs (rollup improvement proposals): Meta RIP7810 : RIP Purpose and Guidelines
RIPs (rollup improvement proposals):
• Meta RIP7810 : RIP Purpose and Guidelines
• ERCs (application layer): ERC7806 : Minimal intent-centric EOA smart account ERC7811 : Wallet asset
discovery ERC7812 : ZK identity registry ERC7813 : Store, table-based introspectable storage
ERCs (application layer):
• ERC7806 : Minimal intent-centric EOA smart account
ERC7806 : Minimal intent-centric EOA smart account
• ERC7811 : Wallet asset discovery
ERC7811 : Wallet asset discovery
• ERC7812 : ZK identity registry
ERC7812 : ZK identity registry
• ERC7813 : Store, table-based introspectable storage
ERC7813 : Store, table-based introspectable storage
Stuff for developers
• Solar : Solidity compiler frontend in Rust; Apache/MIT license
Solar : Solidity compiler frontend in Rust; Apache/MIT license
• Devcon faucet : claim 100 testnet ETH for Mekong, Sepolia & Holešky using ticket on Zupass
Devcon faucet : claim 100 testnet ETH for Mekong, Sepolia & Holešky using ticket on Zupass
• Etherscan EIP2535 Diamond proxy support , beta
Etherscan EIP2535 Diamond proxy support , beta
• Wevm Ox v0.1 (TypeScript): unopinionated low-level utilities & types
Wevm Ox v0.1 (TypeScript): unopinionated low-level utilities & types
• Convert Bank challenge CTF from Foundry to Tevm
Convert Bank challenge CTF from Foundry to Tevm
• Coinbase OnchainKit NFTMintCard (React component): mint NFTs
Coinbase OnchainKit NFTMintCard (React component): mint NFTs
• Micro-eth-signer v0.12.1 : adds Verkle JavaScript implementation
Micro-eth-signer v0.12.1 : adds Verkle JavaScript implementation
Security
• Cross-chain token recovery : script to recover funds sent to a contract address on a chain where the
contract didn’t exist and a list of projects that may be able to recover funds
Ecosystem
• EF 2024 report : Core values : long term thinking, subtraction & stewardship of values Spending :
$105.4M in 2022: $38.2M internal & $67.2M external $134.9M in 2023: $50.2M internal & $84.7M external
22 EF teams Treasury : $970.2M (at Oct 31), $788.7M crypto (99.45% ETH) & $181.5M non-crypto; includes
remaining 26,701 ETH for client incentive program EF conflict of interest policy v1 : internal
disclosures; discussion group to review prior to starting outside work above cap, angel investing,
investing & co-founding; outside work paid in illiquid assets with unknown market value generally
prohibited
EF 2024 report :
• Core values : long term thinking, subtraction & stewardship of values
Core values : long term thinking, subtraction & stewardship of values
• Spending : $105.4M in 2022: $38.2M internal & $67.2M external $134.9M in 2023: $50.2M internal &
$84.7M external 22 EF teams
Spending :
• $105.4M in 2022: $38.2M internal & $67.2M external
$105.4M in 2022: $38.2M internal & $67.2M external
• $134.9M in 2023: $50.2M internal & $84.7M external
$134.9M in 2023: $50.2M internal & $84.7M external
• 22 EF teams
22 EF teams
• Treasury : $970.2M (at Oct 31), $788.7M crypto (99.45% ETH) & $181.5M non-crypto; includes remaining
26,701 ETH for client incentive program
Treasury :
• $970.2M (at Oct 31), $788.7M crypto (99.45% ETH) & $181.5M non-crypto; includes remaining 26,701 ETH
for client incentive program
• EF conflict of interest policy v1 : internal disclosures; discussion group to review prior to
starting outside work above cap, angel investing, investing & co-founding; outside work paid in
illiquid assets with unknown market value generally prohibited
EF conflict of interest policy v1 : internal disclosures; discussion group to review prior to starting
outside work above cap, angel investing, investing & co-founding; outside work paid in illiquid assets
with unknown market value generally prohibited
• Justin Drake & Dankrad Feist drop EigenLayer advisorships
Justin Drake & Dankrad Feist drop EigenLayer advisorships
• Josh Stark: Ethereum's distinctive property is hardness
Josh Stark: Ethereum's distinctive property is hardness
• Evan’s dumbing down of Vitalik’s roadmap explainers: the Scourge
Evan’s dumbing down of Vitalik’s roadmap explainers: the Scourge
Enterprise
• Detroit to accept crypto for fees & taxes using PayPal in mid 2025
Job Listings
• Executive Director for Enterprise Ethereum Alliance
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
• Fees (via ultrasound.money ): Gas: 1.9 to 84.4 gwei, 10.3 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.3
gwei 10.5k ETH net issuance this week
Fees (via ultrasound.money ):
• Gas: 1.9 to 84.4 gwei, 10.3 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.3 gwei
Gas: 1.9 to 84.4 gwei, 10.3 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.3 gwei
• 10.5k ETH net issuance this week
10.5k ETH net issuance this week
• ETHUSD : $2,374 - $2,976, currently $2,959, all time high $4,878
ETHUSD : $2,374 - $2,976, currently $2,959, all time high $4,878
• ETHBTC : currently 0.039 (Flippening at ~0.164)
ETHBTC : currently 0.039 (Flippening at ~0.164)
Notable at app layer
• Synthetix acquires Kwenta after spinning it out in 2020
Synthetix acquires Kwenta after spinning it out in 2020
• MakerDAO votes for Sky brand to stay
MakerDAO votes for Sky brand to stay
• Safe proposers : authorized addresses can prepare transactions for owners to review
Safe proposers : authorized addresses can prepare transactions for owners to review
Regulation/business/tokens
• Michigan pension fund buys more ETH than BTC via ETFs
General
• Okta vulnerability for usernames above 52 characters
END OF SERVICE: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News
Editor: @abcoathup Follow @WeekinEthNews for the most clicked links Permalink:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-november-9-2024

(new/changes in bold )
• Nov 12-15 – Devcon 7 - Southeast Asia (Bangkok)
Nov 12-15 – Devcon 7 - Southeast Asia (Bangkok)

Nov 15-17 – ETHGlobal Bangkok hackathon

Dec 6-8 – ETHIndia hackathon

Jan 30-31 – EthereumZuri.ch conference

May 9-11 – ETHDam (Amsterdam)

May 30 - Jun 4 – ETH Belgrade hackathon & conference
